title: Can't redeem codes
body: I got codes for Dreadknight Garen, Riot Girl Tristana and Unchained Alistar but I always get an error when redeeming. "There was a problem fullfilling your store items, please try again..."

replies.body: No worries, we gotchu fam! Be sure to check your collection the next time you login ^_^
Thank you. Is a rework for BE ever gonna come?Or at least some way  to be able to get more...I'm struggling to even get 1 champion and I need 20 for draft lol

> [{quoted}](name=MeowSaysCat,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=uZwwEais,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-22T00:03:02.257+0000)
>
> Thank you. Is a rework for BE ever gonna come?Or at least some way  to be able to get more...I'm struggling to even get 1 champion and I need 20 for draft lol

If the games aren't ranked the free champions are free to use and they count in the 20 champs for draft, so you only need the rest :)
The codes won't work for me either; can you help me too please?

Could you possibly do the same for me?
If so thanks.
Same problem here with Dreadknight Garen :/
Same stuff, tho I was able to redeem them on another account....
i cant as well wth riot,
